LanguageData.IntakeFan.label: Intake Air Fan
LanguageData.IntakeFan.description: This device takes air from its environment like a room or outside. It channels this air to a Pipe network.
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Blueprint.label: Intake Air Fan (Blueprint)
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Blueprint_Install.label: intakeFan (blueprint)
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Frame.label: Intake Air Fan (Building)
LanguageData.IntakeFan_Frame.description: Channels air from its surrondings to a Pipe Network.

LanguageData.cyanAirPipe.label: Cyan Air Pipe

LanguageData.cyanAirPipe_Frame.description: Cyan Air Pipes for carrying air.
LanguageData.AirThermal.label: Air Climate Control
LanguageData.AirThermal.description: This device takes air from a Pipe Network and cools or heats it depending on the Target temperature.
LanguageData.AirThermal_Blueprint.label: Air Climate Control (Blueprint)
LanguageData.AirThermal_Blueprint_Install.label: airThermal (blueprint)
LanguageData.AirThermal_Frame.label: Air Climate Control (Building)
LanguageData.AirThermal_Frame.description: Converts air in a Pipe Network to its target temperature.
